description.part1: The Calcul'O² platform shows in a simple and intuitive way the energy and greenhouse gas emission savings obtained thanks to the Walloon building renovation strategy.
description.part2: The platform uses the Open Data of the energy saving works financed by Wallonia through the concerned UAP (SWCS, Housing Fund ...)
description.detail: *based on roof insulation by contractor/applicant R>4,5m²K/W

card_eco_energy.title: Energy savings
card_eco_energy.description: Graph detailing the energy saved per year in Wallonia

energy_modal.title: Comparative energy savings per year
energy_modal.description: The energy gain comparison shows the energy savings achieved per year in kWh. These data only concern the roofing and insulation works carried out by the SWCS (= Societé Wallonne du crédit social) since 2016.

card_eco_co2.title: Reduction of CO² emissions
card_eco_co2.description: Discover the CO² emission savings generated by Walloon housing.

co2_modal.title: Reduction of CO² emissions
co2_modal.description: This graph shows the reduction of CO² emissions, per year in Wallonia. These data only concern the roofing and insulation work done by SWCS since 2016.

card_form_calcul.title: Your roof and you
card_form_calcul.description: You want to insulate your roof but you don't know what impact this will have on your current energy consumption? We are here to help you! Click here to learn more.

co2_modal.title: Your roof and you
co2_modal.description: Simulate your insulation work online with our calculation tool. With it, you will know the estimated energy and CO² savings.

form_result.title: Votre estimation :
form_result.co2_eco: Tons of CO² saved per year

card_map_data.title: Select a district on the map.

legend.title: Number of roof insulation jobs by borough.
